```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
bison <- read.csv("~/Desktop/BIS15W2024_tlin/lab6/data/bison.csv")
```

```{r}
dim(bison)
```

```{r}
glimpse(bison)
```

```{r}
bison_new <- select(bison,"data_code","animal_yob","animal_sex","animal_weight")
```

```{r}
bison_80_90 <-filter(bison_new, between(animal_yob,1980,1990))
```

```{r}
table(bison_new$animal_sex)
```

```{r}
male_bison <- filter(bison_80_90,animal_sex=="M")
female_bison <- filter(bison_80_90,animal_sex=="F")
mean(male_bison$animal_weight,na.rm = T)
mean(female_bison$animal_weight)
```
